GET http://localhost:3000/create

Login required
sortBy: For sorting the images,
possibilities: "up asc", "up desc", "down asc" and "down desc"

filterBy (optional): For usernames to filter after
example (optional): "Tester" from RegisterTestUser.txt

start (essential): Start point of the list you get with filter and sortBy
end (essential): end point of the list you get with filter and sortBy

JSON-Body:
{
    "sortBy":"up asc",
    "filterBy":"Tester",
    "start":0,
    "end":4
}

Gives back a list of images which were found for this body definition
